title: Read EPTS Data
text: epts package reading Electronic Performance Tracking Systems (EPTS) data.

title: Read EPTS Data
text: EPTS broad term camera-based wearable technologies measure track football (soccer) players. includes positioning systems track player ball positions, accelerometers, gyroscopes, technologies. data widely used sports analytics. FIFA FC Barcelona developed standard format exchanging EPTS data. standard format requires data providers produce two documents exchanging data: raw data file, contains actual data format can parsed line line. xml file containing metadata data format specification defines format raw data file. epts package makes easy read raw data file according data format specification.

title: Read EPTS Data
text: epts, can: Import raw data file according data format specification. Extract metadata, including specific fields frame rate team names. importing raw data, epts returns data.frame column names defined data format specification. flexibility, metadata extracted list.

title: Read EPTS Data
text: can install development version epts GitHub :

title: Read EPTS Data
text: package includes example data provided FIFA: Import raw data according format specification:
code: library(epts) # txt file including player and ball tracking data raw_data <- epts_example("fifa_example.txt") readLines(raw_data, warn = FALSE) #> [1] "1779143:-769,-2013,-500,100,9.63,9.80,4,5,177,182;-461,-615,-120,99,900,9.10,4,5,170,179;-2638,3478,120,110,1.15,5.20,3,4,170,175;:-2656,367,100:" #> [2] "1779144:-218,1193,2000,100,1.23,3.10,3,3,170,170;1188,1930,1000,100,3.25,3.70,3,3,177,179;-235,-1522,-100,100,2.72,3.20,3,3,180,182;:-521,816,11:"  # xml file including metadata and format specification metadata <- epts_example("fifa_example.xml") read_epts(raw_data, metadata) #> Warning: The number of rows in `data` does not equal the frame count range in #> `metadata`. #>   frameCount player1_x player1_y player1_z player1_distance player1_avg_speed #> 1    1779143      -769     -2013      -500              100              9.63 #> 2    1779144      -218      1193      2000              100              1.23 #>   player1_max_speed player1_acceleration player1_max_acceleration #> 1               9.8                    4                        5 #> 2               3.1                    3                        3 #>   player1_heartbeat player1_max_heartbeat player2_x player2_y player2_z #> 1               177                   182      -461      -615      -120 #> 2               170                   170      1188      1930      1000 #>   player2_distance player2_avg_speed player2_max_speed player2_acceleration #> 1               99            900.00               9.1                    4 #> 2              100              3.25               3.7                    3 #>   player2_max_acceleration player2_heartbeat player2_max_heartbeat player3_x #> 1                        5               170                   179     -2638 #> 2                        3               177                   179      -235 #>   player3_y player3_z player3_distance player3_avg_speed player3_max_speed #> 1      3478       120              110              1.15               5.2 #> 2     -1522      -100              100              2.72               3.2 #>   player3_acceleration player3_max_acceleration player3_heartbeat #> 1                    3                        4               170 #> 2                    3                        3               180 #>   player3_max_heartbeat     x   y   z #> 1                   175 -2656 367 100 #> 2                   182  -521 816  11

title: epts: Read EPTS Data — epts-package
text: Import Electronic Performance Tracking Systems (EPTS) data R. Reads raw data file using data format specification metadata XML-Schema document.

text: data Path raw data txt file. metadata Path format specification xml file.

title: Read EPTS data — read_epts
text: data frame containing representation EPTS data.

title: Read EPTS data — read_epts
code: data <- epts_example("fifa_example.txt") metadata <- epts_example("fifa_example.xml") read_epts(data, metadata) #> Warning: ! The number of rows in `data` does not equal the frame count range in #>   `metadata`: #> ℹ `data` has 2 rows #> ℹ `metadata` has frame count range: [1, 15000] #> Warning: ! Problem with frame count range. Check startFrame and endFrame in `metadata`. #>   frameCount player1_x player1_y player1_z player1_distance player1_avg_speed #> 1    1779143      -769     -2013      -500              100              9.63 #> 2    1779144      -218      1193      2000              100              1.23 #>   player1_max_speed player1_acceleration player1_max_acceleration #> 1               9.8                    4                        5 #> 2               3.1                    3                        3 #>   player1_heartbeat player1_max_heartbeat player2_x player2_y player2_z #> 1               177                   182      -461      -615      -120 #> 2               170                   170      1188      1930      1000 #>   player2_distance player2_avg_speed player2_max_speed player2_acceleration #> 1               99            900.00               9.1                    4 #> 2              100              3.25               3.7                    3 #>   player2_max_acceleration player2_heartbeat player2_max_heartbeat player3_x #> 1                        5               170                   179     -2638 #> 2                        3               177                   179      -235 #>   player3_y player3_z player3_distance player3_avg_speed player3_max_speed #> 1      3478       120              110              1.15               5.2 #> 2     -1522      -100              100              2.72               3.2 #>   player3_acceleration player3_max_acceleration player3_heartbeat #> 1                    3                        4               170 #> 2                    3                        3               180 #>   player3_max_heartbeat     x   y   z #> 1                   175 -2656 367 100 #> 2                   182  -521 816  11
